verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Christ my Lord gave all for me, That from sin I might be free, Now in me He lives again; Glory to His precious Name.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I long to glorify Thee, dear Lord, I long to glorify Thee. In all I do, in all I say, I long to glorify Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Christ my Lord arose and lives, Over all the vict'ry gives, Now in Him I live anew, Praise His Name, I know 'tis true.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Christ my Lord will come one day, Take me home with Him to stay, Then anew His praise I'll sing; Reign with Him my Lord and King.
